categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Resolute was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer.

After the Battle of Hoth, it responded to a Rebel attack on a convoy consisting of BFF-1 bulk freighters M-S and Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transports Epsilon, but it arrived too late, as over half of the convoy had already been destroyed. B-wings that had attacked the convoy turned on this starship afterwards.
The Resolute first appeared in the second bonus mission, "Destroy Troop Convoy," of the 1994 Collector Edition of the 1993 computer game Star Wars: X-Wing.
